summary: The story about an untraditional parish priest, who successfully runs a travel agency.
cast: Dirch Passer|Lone Hertz|Jørgen Ryg|Else-Marie|Preben Mahrt|Vera Gebuhr|Jørgen Kiil|Sisse Reingaard|Arne Møller|Emil Hass Christensen|Bjørn Puggaard-Müller|Carl Ottosen|Suzanne Bech|Jørgen Buckhøj|Ib Makwarth|John Larsen|Lone Lindorff|Lis Adelvard|Albert Watson
title: Nøglen til paradis
